item.title: Minneapolis ICE shooting live updates: Subpoenas served to Gov. Walz, Mayor Frey
item.description: Grand jury subpoenas were served Tuesday to Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey, and other state officials.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: 'Avatar: Fire and Ash' holds top spot for 5th week
item.description: The third installment of the "Avatar" franchise has already brought in more than $1.2 billion worldwide.

item.title: WATCH: Brutal arctic blast wreaks havoc in Midwest before heading to Northeast
item.description: A brutal arctic blast is bringing dangerously low temperatures to the Plains and Midwest before it invades the Northeast.

item.title: WATCH: LA rising: Rebuilding from the wildfires
item.description: Four families share their experience two months after their lives were impacted by the Palisades and Eaton fires in Los Angeles.
